instruction: Please implement a website that displays a 3D human body model to help users understand their body type and future development trends. The website should have the functionality to generate a simulated 3D human body model based on the user's body composition data. Users can input their body composition data to view their current body type and future development trends. The website should also have user registration and login functionality, allowing users to save their body composition data and view their history. Use light slate gray as the screen background and navy for component highlights.

Please develop a client-finding platform to help users find potential clients. The platform should have a search function that allows users to search for potential clients based on location, industry, and other conditions. Users should be able to view client information, send messages, and track client status. The platform should also have data analysis capabilities to help users understand client needs and market trends. Style all pages with a moonstone background and steel blue components.

Please implement a customer service website that automatically responds to client emails. The website should have functionalities for receiving client emails, automatically generating responses, manual approval and modification of responses, and sending responses back to clients. Clients can send inquiries via email, and the website will use a trained model to generate a response. Customer service staff can approve and modify the response, and then send the modified response back to the client. The website should also have email thread management functionality, allowing customer service staff to view and manage client email threads. Color the background using sky blue and set component styles to steel blue.

Please implement a virtual travel experience hub website that includes interactive maps, virtual reality tours, and a booking system for virtual tours. Users should be able to choose and join guided virtual tours, create personalized virtual travel itineraries, attend online cultural workshops, and rent virtual reality travel gear. The website should have a community platform where users can share their virtual travel experiences, tips, and recommendations. Additionally, the website should include a marketplace for virtual travel-related products, where users can purchase virtual travel-related goods and cultural items. Choose desert sand for the background; set all component colors to sienna.

Please implement a Zibo tourism information website to provide comprehensive tourism information services. The website should include information on food, attractions, specialties, accommodations, itineraries, shopping, entertainment, as well as travel strategies and outing recommendations. Users can browse the website, view the latest tourism information, featured recommendations, and other content, understand Zibo's food culture, tourist attractions, accommodation information, and get outing recommendations based on seasons, holidays, and other factors. Set overall background to pale turquoise, then style components with dark cyan.

Please update the PDF documents on the website, including the PDF files in the header and footer. Users should be able to view and download the updated PDF documents. The website should have the functionality to display PDF documents and allow users to download them. The updated PDF documents should be correctly displayed in the header and footer positions. Set the background to amber, and apply chocolate to components.

Please implement a data visualization website for displaying big data analysis results. The website should have functionalities such as data visualization maps and special effects development. Users should be able to browse different types of data visualization charts, including maps, bar charts, and pie charts, and perform data filtering and analysis. The website should also have real-time data updates and refresh functionality to ensure the timeliness and accuracy of the data. Use light cyan for the background and teal for components.

Please improve the functionality and features of a website built with the DIVI theme. The website should have a user-friendly interface, including a navigation menu, homepage slider, product showcase, about us page, and contact us page. Users should be able to browse the website, view product information, submit a contact form, and navigate through the website. The website should also have a responsive design, adapting to different devices and screen sizes. Use antique white for the outer layout and maroon for UI blocks.

Please implement a big data control center website for detecting and analyzing epidemic infection chains. The website should have functionalities for data collection, infection chain analysis, and risk alerts. Users should be able to log in, view epidemic infection chain information, receive infection risk warnings, and query personal infection risk assessment reports. Use turquoise as the default background and cadet blue for component styling.

Please develop a website similar to Twilio and Msg91 for sending and managing messages. The website should have functionalities for sending SMS, managing message templates, and viewing sending records. Users should be able to log in, create and edit message templates, send SMS, view sending records, and manage account information. Set pale rose as the body background and use maroon for the UI.

Please implement a WeChat mini-program for visit reservations and product purchases. The mini-program should have functionalities for visit reservations, product purchases, and payment. Users should be able to log in, browse products, reserve visit times, place orders for selected products, and make payments. The mini-program should also include a personal center where users can view their orders, browsing history, and personal information. Apply seashell to the canvas background and indian red to all visible components.

Please implement a comprehensive travel platform for B2B and B2C businesses, offering services such as hotels, car rentals, flights, and transfers. The platform should have user login and registration features, company information and contact details, and payment gateway integration. Users should be able to browse and book hotels, car rentals, flights, and transfers, and view order information and consumption records. The platform should also have backend management functions, including transfer management, car rental management, tourism packages and tours management, and more. Apply theme using lavender as background and blue violet for elements.

Please implement an airport information service website that provides functions such as flight inquiry and traffic map navigation. The website should have modules for flight inquiry, business information, traffic map navigation, service guide, and member benefits. Users should be able to log in, browse flight information and business information, query traffic maps, view service guides, and enjoy member benefits. Use seashell for the background and indian red for components.

Please implement a Google Store problem-solving website to help users resolve Google Store-related issues. The website should have functionalities for submitting problems, categorizing problems, and providing solutions. Users should be able to log in, submit the problems they encounter, and the website should provide corresponding solutions based on the problem category, allowing users to evaluate and provide feedback on the solutions. Set primary background to light slate gray and elements to navy.

Please implement an email user management website for managing email accounts. The website should have functionalities for adding, deleting, and modifying email accounts. Users should be able to log in, browse the list of email accounts, add new email accounts, delete existing email accounts, modify email account information, and verify email account status. Apply theme using platinum as background and midnight blue for elements.

Please implement a campus part-time job mini-program for posting and managing part-time positions. The mini-program should have functionalities for posting jobs, applying for jobs, and clocking in and out. Students can browse part-time jobs, apply for jobs they are interested in, and clock in and out when starting and ending work. Employers can post part-time jobs, manage job applications, and view employee clock-in records. Establish porcelain as the main background and olive for the controls.

Please implement a Redis PHP client website for managing Redis data. The website should have functionalities for adding, deleting, modifying, and querying Redis data. Users should be able to log in, browse Redis data, add new data, delete selected data, modify selected data, and query specific data. Choose ivory for global background and chocolate for all components.

Please implement the design and development of the homepage and subpages of the Jinchang City People's Government website, including redesigning and redeveloping some historical web pages, implementing data display and processing, and performing data encryption and hiding. The website should have functions for publishing, uploading, and editing content, and should be able to perform daily maintenance. Users should be able to browse the website, view government information and news, and be able to search and download related files. Configure the background color to medium turquoise, with components using dark slate gray.

Please implement a cricket website that provides live scores. The website should have functionalities for displaying live scores, schedules, team rankings, and player profiles. Users should be able to browse current and upcoming matches, view detailed information about teams and players, and follow live scores in real-time. Configure your theme with light steel blue as background and dark slate gray as component color.

Please implement a personal resume mini-program for job seeking purposes. The mini-program should have functionalities for displaying personal information, education background, work experience, and skill showcases. Users should be able to browse the resume, view detailed information, and share it with others via QR code. The mini-program should include a home page, personal information page, education background page, work experience page, and skill showcase page. Specify ivory as the base color and chocolate for all components.

Please implement a shopping cart management system for online shopping. The system should have functionalities for browsing products, adding products to the cart, modifying product quantities in the cart, removing products from the cart, and submitting orders. Users should be able to log in, browse products, add products to the cart, view cart contents, submit orders, and view order status. Apply theme using light coral as background and brown for elements.

Please implement a website based on ReactJs and Mongo and deploy it to Cpanel. The website should have functionalities such as user interface, data storage and retrieval. Users should be able to browse the website, view data, and interact with it. The website should be able to handle user input, update data, and display results in real-time. The website should also have error handling and debugging capabilities to ensure its stability and security. Configure your theme with light beige as background and sienna as component color.

Please implement a web application for inventory and request management to manage inventory and process requests. The application should have functionalities for user management, inventory management, request management, notification system, reporting system, and dashboard. Users should be able to log in, browse inventory, submit requests, view notifications, generate reports, and monitor the dashboard. Inventory management should include real-time inventory tracking, category and subcategory organization, pipe inventory management, and more. Request management should include multiple request types, request lifecycle management, partial fulfillment tracking, and more. Design the site using champagne as the background and burnt sienna for content blocks.

Please implement a Golden Acorn game website for users to find gold coins, silver coins, and copper coins. Users can find gold coins, silver coins, and copper coins through offline search methods and obtain hints through acorns. Acorns can be obtained through completing tasks, recharging, or system gifts. Users can use acorns to eliminate gold coin grids, obtain text hints for silver and copper coins. The website should have functions such as user registration, login, task management, acorn management, and search records. Color the background using faint peach and set component styles to coral.

Please implement a daily activity page for a game, used to display the game's daily activities and tasks. The page should have functionalities for displaying activity information, task lists, activity rules, and rewards. Users should be able to browse activity information, view task lists, understand activity rules, and receive rewards. The page should also have user login and registration functions, allowing users to log in and view their activity records and task progress. Use moccasin as the screen background and sandy brown for component highlights.

Please implement a PHP process management tool to start and stop PHP processes. The tool should have functionalities to start, stop, and restart PHP processes. Users should be able to control PHP processes by inputting start, stop, or restart options through the command line. The tool should also be able to monitor the running status of PHP processes and provide notifications when a process terminates abnormally. Establish light steel blue as the main background and dark slate gray for the controls.

Please implement a green plant mini-program for sharing and purchasing green plant-related products. The mini-program should have community features such as topic discussions, experience sharing, cultivation recommendations, and cultivation plans. At the same time, it should include an online mall where users can browse and purchase green plant-related products and support online payment functions. Users should be able to register and log in to the mini-program, manage personal information, and view order records. Assign alice blue to the background and cornflower blue to the UI elements.

Please implement a mini-program for tourism booking and merchandise purchase. The mini-program should have functionalities for managing tourist attractions, making reservations, and purchasing merchandise. Users should be able to browse attraction information, make reservations, purchase related products, and view order information. The mini-program should also have user login and registration functions, allowing users to view their order history and personal information. Apply floral white as the background; style all components with dark red.

Please implement a web application based on Vue.js with single-page application functionality. The application should be able to quickly respond to user feedback and develop modular code for future reuse. The application should also be able to run on memory-constrained devices and provide a lightweight Web UI. Specify aquamarine as the base color and dark turquoise for all components.

Please implement an online classroom website for remote teaching and real-time interaction. The website should have functionalities such as real-time audio and video communication, uploading and synchronizing course materials, real-time chat, uploading and downloading images, scanning QR codes to upload images, and synchronizing whiteboard drawings. Users should be able to log in, attend online classes, interact in real-time with teachers and other students, upload and download course materials, and use whiteboard tools. Configure all backgrounds with caramel and all components with saddle brown.

Please implement a dice synthesis game where players can combine small dice to form larger ones. The game should have a synthesis function, where players can combine three or more small dice to form a larger one. The game should also have a scoring function, where players can view their scores. Players should be able to operate the game through clicks or swipes. Configure the background color to pale turquoise, with components using dark cyan.

Please implement a web application for form processing and document generation. Users should be able to fill out forms through the web page and submit them. After submission, the system will generate corresponding documents based on the form data and provide a download function. Users should be able to browse and manage their own forms and documents. The system should also have user login and registration functions to ensure user data security. Use platinum as the screen background and midnight blue for component highlights.

Please implement a website with interactive 3D animations to enhance user engagement. The website should have interactive animations that allow users to click and drag to rotate objects, trigger animations when scrolling, and tell a story or convey information through animations. Users should be able to interact with 3D models by clicking and dragging to view objects from different angles and trigger animations when scrolling down the page. Use seashell for container backgrounds and indian red for component visuals.

Please implement a graph database query website for importing and querying data. The website should have a data import function that supports single-table import and SQL import. Users can import data into the graph database, then query the data and display the query results in a graphical format. The website should also support cql management of the graph database, allowing users to use cql language to manage and maintain the graph database. Set light sea green as the body background and use dark slate gray for the UI.

Please implement a network firewall management website for configuring and managing firewall rules. The website should have functionalities for adding, deleting, modifying, and viewing firewall rules. Users should be able to log in, browse existing firewall rules, add new rules, delete unnecessary rules, modify existing rules, and view firewall log records. Implement styling with cornsilk for the background and rosy brown for components.

Please implement a diary WeChat mini-program for users to record and share their diaries. The mini-program should have functionalities for user login, diary writing, saving, and sharing. Users should be able to log in, write diaries, save diaries, and share diaries with friends. The mini-program should also have diary categorization, search, and deletion functions. Assign faint gray to the background and slate gray to the UI elements.

Please implement an RSS collection and caching website for collecting and caching subscription information. The website should have functionalities for collecting subscription information, caching subscription information, searching queries, and category management. Users should be able to add subscription sources, cache subscription information, and use search queries and category management to find and manage subscription information. Use gainsboro for the outer layout and dark slate blue for UI blocks.

Please implement a multi-platform social media management tool to manage social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn. The tool should have intermediate-level post scheduling capabilities, allowing for time-based and queue-based planning, and provide comprehensive analytics for detailed performance reporting. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage different social media accounts, schedule posts, view post history, and analyze post performance. Use moonstone for the outer layout and steel blue for UI blocks.

Please implement a news aggregation website that collects and displays RSS and Atom Feeds. The website should have functionalities such as automatic feed discovery and RSS output. Users should be able to add, remove, and manage RSS and Atom Feed sources, view aggregated news content, and share it with other users through RSS output. Apply theme using blanched almond as background and dark slate gray for elements.

Please implement a news sharing application that rewards users for sharing news. The application should have functionalities for sharing news, tracking clicks, and calculating earnings. Users should be able to log in, browse news, share news to WeChat groups, view the clicks and earnings generated by their shares. The application should also have features such as user rankings and earnings details. Initialize the background color with navajo white and component color with tan.

Please implement a content management website for managing and publishing various content. The website should have functionalities for adding, editing, and deleting content. Users should be able to log in, browse, search, and manage different types of content, including text, images, and videos. The website should also have permission management functionality to control access and operation permissions for different users. Use pale turquoise for the background and dark cyan for components.

Please implement a spam filtering website to remove junk emails and viruses from email accounts. The website should have functionalities for email scanning, spam identification, and virus detection. Users should be able to log in, configure their email accounts, set filtering rules, view scan results, and manage filtered emails. Set all pages to have a feather white background and dark green components.

Please implement a WeChat mini-program for information inquiry. The mini-program should have functionalities for information query, filtering, and pagination. Users should be able to input query conditions, filter results, browse data by pages, and view detailed information. Specify faint peach as the base color and coral for all components.

Please implement a WeChat template message push system to push messages to users. The system should have functionalities for importing target Excel files, building message templates, and creating tasks. Users should be able to log in, import target Excel files, create and edit message templates, create push tasks, and view push records. Define background as alice blue; define components with cornflower blue.

Please implement a campus life APP for publishing tasks such as errands and shopping. The APP should have functional modules such as street stalls, rewards, small stores, and mine. Users can log in to the APP, publish tasks such as errands, shopping, Q&A, finding people, finding objects, and organizing activities, and browse tasks published by other users. Users can choose tasks based on their needs and communicate with the task publishers. Use orchid for the background and purple for components.

Please implement a mobile card game that supports online multiplayer and single-player modes. The game should have features such as online matchmaking, AI opponents, user registration and login, game mode selection, leaderboards, and rewards. Users should be able to register and log in, choose game modes including classic and custom modes, and participate in leaderboard competitions. The game should also have options for in-app purchases and premium subscriptions. Choose blanched almond for global background and dark slate gray for all components.

Please implement a gig economy supermarket website that provides public employment services. The website should have functionalities such as registration and login, job searching, job posting, resume management, and recruitment information management. Users should be able to register and log in to the website, search and apply for jobs, post job information, manage their resumes and recruitment information. The website should also provide real-time employment information and recruitment updates. Configure all backgrounds with pale ash and all components with slate gray.

Please implement a financial management system for enterprise financial management. The system should have functionalities for budget management, cost accounting, and financial statement generation. Users should be able to log in, create and manage budgets, record and account for costs, generate financial statements, and view financial data. The system should ensure data security by using encryption storage and backup mechanisms. Establish porcelain as the main background and olive for the controls.

Please implement a name card mini-program for displaying and exchanging personal information. Users should be able to create and edit their own name cards, including name, occupation, company, contact information, and more. At the same time, users should be able to browse and search for others' name card information and interact with them through likes, comments, and other ways. The name card mini-program should also support direct dialing, sending emails, and other operations. Set overall background to baby blue, then style components with navy.

Please implement a WordPress website based on Bootstrap, with a responsive design and customizable layout. Users should be able to browse the website, read articles, view images and videos, and interact with the author through the comment feature. The website should have a clear navigation menu, including home, about, contact, and other functions. Users should be able to quickly find the content they need through the search function. Choose gold for global background and dark goldenrod for all components.

Please implement a web instant messaging application for real-time chat between users. The application should have functionalities for sending and receiving messages, creating and managing chat groups, and viewing chat history. Users should be able to log in, engage in real-time chat with other users, create and join groups, and view past chat records. Set the background to wheat, and apply goldenrod to components.

Please implement an online instant messaging website for real-time chat between users. The website should have functionalities for adding friends, sending text or voice messages, and adding friends by scanning a code or entering an account number. Users should be able to log in, add friends, send text or voice messages to friends, view chat history, and manage their friend list. Choose cream for global background and dark teal for all components.

Please implement an online photo gallery website for displaying and managing images. The website should have functionalities for adding, deleting, and editing images, as well as adding descriptions, setting password protection, and access permissions. Users should be able to browse images, view image descriptions, and access protected images based on their permissions. Assign moccasin as the background color and apply sandy brown to all elements.

Please implement a finance and supply chain ERP system to optimize financial and inventory management. The system should have functionalities for optimizing financial processes, managing inventory, and optimizing procurement processes. Users should be able to log in, browse financial statements, inventory information, and purchase orders, perform financial activities and inventory management, and manage suppliers. The system should also have forecasting and automated procurement functions. Use pale green in the background layer and forest green for the component layer.

Please implement a mobile website content management system for managing and publishing mobile website content. The system should have functionalities for adding, editing, and deleting content, and support multiple languages, including Chinese, English, German, and more. Users should be able to log in, manage website content, including adding new content, editing existing content, deleting unnecessary content, and support multi-language display. Design the site using light slate gray as the background and navy for content blocks.

Please implement an Emoji conversion website that handles and converts Emoji expressions. The website should have functionalities for inputting Emoji text, converting Emoji to text, and converting text to Emoji. Users should be able to input Emoji text, select conversion options, view conversion results, and copy the converted text. Set the background to pale goldenrod, and apply dark khaki to components.

Please implement a travel planning WeChat mini-program for route planning and trip cost calculation. Users should be able to use the mini-program's map API to plan routes, calculate trip distances and estimated times, and submit data such as trip distance and number of passengers to calculate prices. The mini-program should also include car rental and other related services. Users should be able to browse different types of vehicles, select car rental services, view rental prices and related information. Use light salmon as the screen background and coral for component highlights.

Please implement a corporate website to display company information and products. The website should have a multi-language switching function, which can automatically switch to the corresponding language version based on the browser's default language. Users can browse company introductions, product information, news, and other content, and switch between different language versions. The website should also have a responsive layout that can automatically adapt to PC and mobile devices. Implement styling with orchid for the background and purple for components.

Please implement a website to display job information related to Ctrip tourism. The website should have a job list display function, including information such as job title, skill requirements, work city, salary, and company name. Users can browse the job list, view job details, and perform searches and filters. Select silver for layout background and dark slate blue for component details.

Please implement a Bitcoin investment website for users to invest and manage their Bitcoin. The website should have functionalities such as a user account dashboard, admin dashboard, and financial/investment calculator. Users should be able to log in, browse investment products, make investments, view investment records, and manage their accounts. The website should also have a referral system, where users can invite friends to join and receive rewards. Use khaki in the background layer and dark khaki for the component layer.

Please implement a database visualization website for connecting to and managing databases. The website should have functionalities for connecting to databases, monitoring computer performance, and directly performing CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations on databases. Users should be able to log in, connect to different databases, monitor computer performance, browse and manage data within databases, and perform CRUD operations. Style the layout with mint cream in the background and dark green for the interface.

Please implement a mini-program for parents to query school information and policy interpretations. The mini-program should have functionalities for querying school information, interpreting policies, parent forum discussions, and recommending the latest policies. Users should be able to log in, browse information about different schools, query policy interpretations, participate in parent forum discussions, and obtain the latest policy recommendations. Declare light coral as the global background color and indian red for all UI pieces.

Please create a blog website targeting Spanish and Portuguese speaking countries, including features such as article posting, comments, categories, tags, and search. Users should be able to browse and search articles, post comments, and subscribe to blog updates. The website should support multiple languages, including Spanish and Portuguese. Establish aquamarine as the main background and dark turquoise for the controls.

Please implement a website for the Game of Life, used to simulate and display the rules of the game. The website should have the functionality to simulate the Game of Life, supporting multiple classic rules such as b3s23, and also support user-defined rules. Users should be able to select rules, set game parameters, start the simulation, and observe the game's progress. The website should also provide a recording function, allowing users to record and analyze the game process. Apply silver for the layout background and dark slate blue for interactive elements.

Please implement an integrated supply chain management website for managing inventory, shipping, and financial settlement. The website should have functionalities for inventory management, shipping management, and financial settlement. Users should be able to log in and manage inventory, shipping orders, financial reports, etc. The mobile end should have functions for loading personnel to use, including scanning goods and updating inventory. The WeChat mini-program should have functions for drivers to use, including viewing shipping orders and updating shipping status. Set all pages to have a medium aquamarine background and sea green components.

Please implement a data visualization website to display data. The website should have functionalities for data interaction and page rendering. Users should be able to browse different types of data, select different visualization methods, customize the style and layout of the data display, and update the data in real-time. Specify light salmon as the base color and tomato for all components.

Please implement a Changan Cloud Map dealer management system for managing dealerships and customer resources. The system should have functionalities for sharing customer resources, managing dealerships, allocating vehicles and leads, auditing loan applications, managing deposits, buying and selling vehicles, issuing policy notifications, and organizing marketing activities. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage dealership information, allocate vehicles and leads, audit loan applications, manage deposits, and publish policy notifications and marketing activity information. Implement styling with mint cream for the background and dark green for components.

Please implement an alumni association website for managing alumni information and providing a social platform. The website should have functionalities for alumni information management, alumni socializing, activity notifications, alumni resource sharing, and news announcements. Users should be able to register and update their personal information, establish connections and interact, browse and share activity information, access and share career resources, and view news and announcements. Assign light coral to body backgrounds and brown to main components.

Please implement a SAAS mall website for user login, product management, and ordering functions. The website should have functionalities for user login and registration, product management, ordering, and shipping. Users should be able to log in, browse products, place orders for selected products, and view order status. Merchants should be able to manage products, set up activities, and ship products. The website should also have WeChat binding and decoration functions. Select glacier blue for layout background and royal blue for component details.

Please implement a web-based data entry software that has the functionality to import Excel data, manage data, and manage customer information. Users should be able to log in to the software, import existing Excel data, manage and edit data, view and edit customer information, and add detailed customer notes. The software should also have the functionality to quickly access tracking information, such as clickable numbers that open related hyperlinks. Apply pale lilac as the background; style all components with dark orchid.

Please implement a content management system for editing and managing website content. The system should have an intuitive and flexible content editing function, allowing users to edit content directly on the page. Users should be able to download and install modules and themes to customize the website's functionality and appearance. The system should also have user management, permission control, and content publishing functions. Use misty rose in the background layer and medium violet red for the component layer.

Please fix a website issue where the page flickers when changing languages. The website should maintain layout consistency when switching languages and prevent page flickering. Users should be able to switch languages on the website, and the website should automatically update its content to accommodate the new language setting. The website should have internationalization and localization features to cater to different languages and regions. Use a feather white background and apply dark green to the UI components.

Please implement an anti-addiction mini-program to promote awareness about responsible gaming. The mini-program should have functionalities for mental health assessment, news feed, and anti-addiction mini-games. Users should be able to log in, take mental health assessments, browse news feeds, play anti-addiction mini-games, and view their assessment results and game records. Style the layout with faint peach in the background and coral for the interface.

Please implement a new high school exam teaching management website for managing teaching, exams, and student information. The website should have functionalities for teaching management, exam management, teacher management, student management, school resource management, and data analysis. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage teaching plans, exam schedules, teacher information, and student information. The system should also have an automatic scheduling function, calculating a reasonable scheduling result based on administrative class teaching plans, itinerant class teaching plans, and other conditions. Color the background using light sea green and set component styles to medium sea green.

Please implement a general management backend website for system management and configuration. The website should have functionalities for user login, registration, permission management, and system configuration. Users should be able to log in, browse system information, configure system parameters, manage user permissions, and view system logs. Set gold as the body background and use dark goldenrod for the UI.

Please implement a recruitment WeChat mini-program to help educational institutions improve their enrollment efficiency. The mini-program should have functionalities such as activity publishing, activity registration, member distribution, institution binding/unbinding, etc. Users should be able to browse activities, sign up for activities, view member information, bind/unbind institutions, etc. The mini-program should also have marketing tools such as group buying, price cutting, and distribution. Implement glacier blue for the page background and royal blue for the elements.

Please implement a multilingual website that includes support for the Hindi language. The website should have a language switching function, allowing users to switch between different languages, including Hindi. The website should be able to correctly display Hindi text and support Hindi input methods. Users should be able to register, log in, and browse website content, including articles, news, and product information. Configure the background color to cream, with components using dark teal.

Please implement a report generator web application that generates reports based on Excel data and PowerPoint templates. The application should have functionalities for uploading Excel files, selecting PowerPoint templates, customizing report content, and generating PPT or PDF reports. Users should be able to log in, upload Excel data files, select suitable PowerPoint templates, customize the report's content and format, generate the final PPT or PDF report, and download or share the report. Configure the background color to pale turquoise, with components using dark cyan.

Please implement a brain electrical activity exchange mini-program for doctors to share brain electrical images and case information. The mini-program should have functionalities for publishing cases, browsing others' published cases, uploading images and videos, and displaying user comments. Doctors should be able to log in, publish their own typical or difficult cases, browse and learn from other doctors' published cases, and view user comments and a leaderboard. Apply theme using silver as background and dark slate blue for elements.

Please implement a meeting room reservation system for managing meeting room bookings and notifications. The system should have functionalities for meeting reservations, reminders, single sign-on, attendee selection, meeting list display, and video meeting reservations. Users should be able to log in, browse the meeting room list, book a meeting room, set reminders, select attendees, and view the meeting list. The system should also support mobile reservations and display the booking status of each meeting room on a panel. Set the background to morning mist, and apply navy to components.

Please implement a web application based on Spark-java that has user registration, login, browsing, and search functions. Users should be able to register an account, log in to the system, browse different types of content, and search for information of interest. The system should have basic user management functions, including user information modification and password reset. Configure your theme with moonstone as background and steel blue as component color.

Please implement a tea recording mini-program to record users' tea drinking diaries. The mini-program should have functionalities for recording tea drinking diaries, selecting tea, water, and utensils. Users should be able to record detailed information about each tea drinking experience, including tea type, water temperature, and utensils, and share their tea diaries on social media. After sharing, they can receive rewards, such as badges. Choose faint gold for the background; set all component colors to saddle brown.

Please implement a template system website for displaying and managing templates. The website should have functionalities for adding, deleting, editing, and previewing templates. Users should be able to log in, browse templates, add new templates, delete unnecessary templates, edit existing templates, and preview template effects. Set the background to peach puff, and apply firebrick to components.

Please implement an RSS feed aggregation and automation website to extract data from government data RSS feeds. The website should have the following functionalities: periodically visit specified URLs, download RSS files, monitor RSS updates, and when there are new updates, download HTML links as HTM and PDF files, and save these files to a specified storage location. Users should be able to view downloaded files and manage storage locations. Use lemon mist for container backgrounds and dark orange for component visuals.

Please develop a web application with user authentication, real-time updates, and responsive design. The application should be able to address page loading issues, functionality errors, and UI/UX improvements. Users should be able to log in and update data in real-time, and the application should be responsive to different devices and screen sizes. The application should also be able to quickly resolve functionality errors and page loading issues and continuously improve the user experience. Assign light salmon to body backgrounds and coral to main components.

Please implement an educational platform for uploading and sharing educational videos, content, and questions. The platform should have functionalities for uploading videos, content, and questions, including multiple-choice and exam-style questions. Students should be able to register and log in to the platform, access and download relevant materials, including videos, notes, and worksheets. The platform should also have a subscription feature, where students need to pay a subscription fee to access the materials. Initialize the background color with pale goldenrod and component color with dark olive green.

Please implement an interactive 3D visualization website to display 3D models. The website should have interactive features that allow users to rotate, zoom, and pan the 3D models. Users should be able to interact with the 3D models using mouse or touch operations, and the website should have a user-friendly interface that ensures smooth performance. Apply powder blue as the background; style all components with royal blue.

Please implement a wall painting material website that connects clients with painters. The website should have functionalities for posting demands, finding painters, viewing cases, job listings, and my homepage. Clients can post painting demands, browse nearby painters, and view painters' works and evaluations. Painters can post job information, showcase their works, and receive orders. Configure your theme with light beige as background and sienna as component color.

Please develop a car industry APP that provides road conditions, map, and vehicle information functions. The APP should have a road condition assistant function that collects and analyzes real-time road traffic data to provide drivers with the latest road condition information. At the same time, the APP should have a map information function that includes traditional navigation functions and intelligent elements, supporting voice control and gesture operation. In addition, the APP should have a vehicle information function that can obtain and display the vehicle's various status information in real-time, such as fuel consumption, speed, and mileage, and can diagnose and warn of vehicle faults. Configure all backgrounds with linen white and all components with burlywood.

Please implement a jewelry ERP system for managing inventory and sales in the jewelry industry. The system should have functionalities for inventory management, sales management, live sales, and online store sales. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage inventory, conduct sales and live sales, and view sales records and inventory changes. Configure all backgrounds with light goldenrod yellow and all components with olive drab.

Please implement a tourism mini-program that provides travel route packages, scenic spot tickets, and tourist strategies. The mini-program should have functions such as travel route packages, scenic spot tickets, tourist strategies, financial details, and partner commission. Users should be able to browse and purchase travel route packages and scenic spot tickets, view tourist strategies, manage financial details, and share QR codes and posters. Configure all backgrounds with alice blue and all components with cornflower blue.

Please implement a simple content management system for creating and managing small websites. The system should have a visual editor that allows users to edit and manage website content. Users should be able to set titles, keywords, and descriptions for each page, and the system should be able to handle search engine optimization. The system should also be able to support users in creating and managing websites with no more than 20 pages. Choose platinum for global background and midnight blue for all components.

Please implement an enterprise resource planning backend management system for managing internal company data. The system should have user management, permission management, module lists, add, edit, delete, and display functions. Users should be able to log in to the system, browse and manage data in different modules, including adding new data, editing existing data, deleting unnecessary data, and displaying all data. The system should also support Excel import and export functions for convenient batch data operations. Use alabaster as the screen background and dark cyan for component highlights.

Please implement a WeChat mini-program for functions such as real-name authentication, ID recognition, and information query. Users should be able to use the mini-program to authenticate their real names, upload ID information, query personal information, conduct online transactions, use facial recognition, and chat with customer service online. The mini-program should have multiple modules, including real-name authentication, ID recognition, information query, online transactions, facial recognition, and online chat. Set page background to ghost white; color all components with cadet blue.

Please implement a web application with a file saving feature that includes both automatic and manual saving options. The user should be able to choose between automatic and manual saving, and the application should correctly save the file and provide file management functionality. The user should be able to browse and manage saved files, including viewing a list of files, deleting files, and downloading files. Set page background to pewter; color all components with cadet blue.

Please implement a B2B lead generation website for an Indian agency to provide potential clients. The website should have functionalities for collecting lead information, categorizing leads, and following up on leads. Users should be able to log in, browse the list of services including website design and development, SEO, social media marketing, and virtual assistance, submit lead information, and track the status of leads. Apply aquamarine for the layout background and dark turquoise for interactive elements.

Please implement a toolbox mini-program that includes various commonly used small tools, such as watermark removal. Users should be able to open the mini-program, browse and use different tools, such as watermark removal, image editing, and text conversion. The mini-program should have a user-friendly interface, making it easy for users to quickly find and use the tools they need. Color the background using faint gold and set component styles to saddle brown.

Please implement a website for a psychological counseling company to display the latest news, teacher profiles, and assessments. The website should have functionalities for displaying the latest news, introducing teachers, and providing assessment tools. Users should be able to browse the latest news, learn about teachers, take online assessments, and view assessment results. Implement seashell for the page background and indian red for the elements.

Please implement a control system automation portfolio website to display automation projects. The website should have functionalities for project showcase, case introduction, and contact information. Users should be able to browse the website, view introductions, images, and videos of automation projects, and contact the developer through the contact information. Initialize the background color with light salmon and component color with tomato.

Please implement a video conferencing website for real-time multi-person conversations. The website should have functionalities for creating meetings, joining meetings, and audio/video calls. Users should be able to log in, create meetings and invite other users to join, join existing meetings, and engage in audio/video conversations. Users should also be able to control their microphones and cameras, share their screens, and view other users' video streams. Establish buttermilk as the main background and peru for the controls.

Please implement an email configuration and migration website to help users migrate their email accounts. The website should have functionalities for email account migration, DNS record setup, and email configuration. Users should be able to log in, enter their email account information, choose the target platform for migration, set up DNS records, and configure their email client. The website should be able to detect and resolve errors during the migration process, ensuring a successful email account migration. Use moonstone for the outer layout and steel blue for UI blocks.

Please implement a personal database website for recording various life details. The website should have multiple functional modules, including my computer, my phone, my products, my car, my finances, my diet, my itinerary, and my movies. Users should be able to log in, browse, add, edit, and delete information in each module. Each module should have corresponding data entry and display functions, such as the my computer module being able to record computer model, configuration, purchase time, and other information. Use light cyan as the screen background and teal for component highlights.

Please implement an API endpoint for an investigation page, including functions for retrieving investigation data and submitting investigation results. Users should be able to use the API endpoint to retrieve investigation questions, options, and other related information, and submit their own investigation results. The API endpoint should also support querying and statistical analysis of investigation results. Style all pages with a orchid background and purple components.

Please implement a web application with real-time data processing capabilities that provides real-time data interaction for a broad audience. The application should have functionalities such as real-time data updates, real-time search, and real-time notifications. Users should be able to view data in real-time, perform real-time searches, and receive real-time notifications. The application should also have a user-friendly interface that is adaptable to different devices and screen sizes. Set the background color to pale rose and the component color to maroon.

Please implement an RSS feed reader website for reading and managing RSS feeds. The website should have functionalities for categorizing, filtering, and prioritizing feeds. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage RSS feeds, including standard feed items and images/photos. Users should also be able to set feed priorities and filter conditions. Use a thistle background and apply medium purple to the UI components.
